title: Ep 23 | Smells of the Duck Blind and Losing a Loved One
description:
Jase describes the sights, sounds, and smells of the duck blind, Al watches "Poltergeist," and Phil remembers his younger sister.  
See episodes of "Unashamed with Phil Robertson": https://bit.ly/2J4XsiX
See clips from Phil's TV show "In the Woods with Phil": https://bit.ly/2PNM6k1
